page.title: 15Viewpark Gala Week
page.content: Our gala week is all about getting as many people in the commun- ity as possible to be happy and have fun. The week starts off with a parade of decorated floats with adults and children dressed up. In 1985 we only had 3 floats. The gala queen arrives in a Rolls Royce;her attendants come in two Mer- cedes. Each of the four primary sch- ools has a chance to provide the queen and attendants. Sometimes parachutists drop in. The main attraction is the fun- fair in the park. The Umbrellas and Speedway are popular. There are sta- lls where you can throw darts or sh- oot and win a goldfish or teddy-bear. Next year,1986, will be our school's turn for the queen and attendants.
